author: benjaminchodroff
content:
CLWP is now accepting submissions for Zhejiang validators to broadcast the BLSChangeToExecution message: https://github.com/benjaminchodroff/ConsensusLayerWithdrawalProtection

We welcome volunteers to load these messages into their nodes to help broadcast them as well. "Gossip via GitHub"
